sn12.22:1.2: “Dasabalasamannāgato, bhikkhave, tathāgato catūhi ca vesārajjehi samannāgato āsabhaṃ ṭhānaṃ paṭijānāti, parisāsu sīhanādaṃ nadati, brahmacakkaṃ pavatteti:
sn12.22:1.3: ‘iti rūpaṃ iti rūpassa samudayo iti rūpassa atthaṅgamo,
sn12.22:1.4: iti vedanā iti vedanāya samudayo iti vedanāya atthaṅgamo,
sn12.22:1.5: iti saññā iti saññāya samudayo iti saññāya atthaṅgamo,
sn12.22:1.6: iti saṅkhārā iti saṅkhārānaṃ samudayo iti saṅkhārānaṃ atthaṅgamo,
sn12.22:1.7: iti viññāṇaṃ iti viññāṇassa samudayo iti viññāṇassa atthaṅgamo.
sn12.22:1.8: Iti imasmiṃ sati idaṃ hoti, imassuppādā idaṃ uppajjati;
sn12.22:1.9: imasmiṃ asati idaṃ na hoti imassa nirodhā idaṃ nirujjhati.
sn12.22:2.1: Evaṃ svākkhāto, bhikkhave, mayā dhammo uttāno vivaṭo pakāsito chinnapilotiko.
sn12.22:2.2: Evaṃ svākkhāte kho, bhikkhave, mayā dhamme uttāne vivaṭe pakāsite chinnapilotike alameva saddhāpabbajitena kulaputtena vīriyaṃ ārabhituṃ:
sn12.22:2.3: ‘kāmaṃ taco ca nhāru ca aṭṭhi ca avasissatu, sarīre upassussatu maṃsalohitaṃ. Yaṃ taṃ purisathāmena purisavīriyena purisaparakkamena pattabbaṃ, na taṃ apāpuṇitvā vīriyassa saṇṭhānaṃ bhavissatī’ti.
sn12.22:3.1: Dukkhaṃ, bhikkhave, kusīto viharati vokiṇṇo pāpakehi akusalehi dhammehi, mahantañca sadatthaṃ parihāpeti.
sn12.22:3.2: Āraddhavīriyo ca kho, bhikkhave, sukhaṃ viharati pavivitto pāpakehi akusalehi dhammehi, mahantañca sadatthaṃ paripūreti.
sn12.22:3.3: Na, bhikkhave, hīnena aggassa patti hoti.
sn12.22:3.4: Aggena ca kho, bhikkhave, aggassa patti hoti.
sn12.22:3.6: Tasmātiha, bhikkhave, vīriyaṃ ārabhatha appattassa pattiyā, anadhigatassa adhigamāya, asacchikatassa sacchikiriyāya.
sn12.22:3.7: ‘Evaṃ no ayaṃ amhākaṃ pabbajjā avañjhā bhavissati saphalā saudrayā.
sn12.22:3.8: Yesañca mayaṃ paribhuñjāma cīvarapiṇḍapātasenāsanagilānappaccayabhesajjaparikkhāraṃ tesaṃ te kārā amhesu mahapphalā bhavissanti mahānisaṃsā’ti—
sn12.22:3.10: Attatthaṃ vā hi, bhikkhave, sampassamānena alameva appamādena sampādetuṃ;
sn12.22:3.11: paratthaṃ vā hi, bhikkhave, sampassamānena alameva appamādena sampādetuṃ;
sn12.22:3.12: ubhayatthaṃ vā hi, bhikkhave, sampassamānena alameva appamādena sampādetun”ti.
